title: The Eagles Fire Doug Pederson
description:
We discuss the Eagles cutting ties with Doug Pederson and where both parties go from here (01:00). Later, we look back at the Steelers’ loss to the Browns and discuss Ben Roethlisberger’s future in black and gold (15:00). We also look at Deshaun Watson possibly being traded (29:00), and close the show with playoff predictions for this weekend (37:00).
Hosts: Ryan Shazier and Cole Wright
Guest: Kaelen Jones
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
